query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `iot_work_order_tasks` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `work_order_id` int NOT NULL,
  `task_number` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `estimated_duration` int DEFAULT 15,
  `actual_duration` int,
  `status` enum('pending','in_progress','completed','skipped') DEFAULT 'pending',
  `assigned_to` int,
  `completed_by` int,
  `completed_at` timestamp NULL,
  `notes` text,
  `checklist_items` json,
  `required_tools` json,
  `safety_precautions` text,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `idx_task_wo` (`work_order_id`),
  INDEX `idx_task_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_task_assigned` (`assigned_to`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `iot_work_order_tasks` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `work_order_id` int NOT NULL,
  `task_number` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `estimated_duration` int DEFAULT 15,
  `actual_duration` int,
  `status` enum('pending','in_progress','completed','skipped') DEFAULT 'pending',
  `assigned_to` int,
  `completed_by` int,
  `completed_at` timestamp NULL,
  `notes` text,
  `checklist_items` json,
  `required_tools` json,
  `safety_precautions` text,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `idx_task_wo` (`work_order_id`),
  INDEX `idx_task_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_task_assigned` (`assigned_to`)
);
